description: A classic style that's big on warmth, this jacket features water-resistant fabric, 650-fill RDS certified down, and a baffled construction that goes all the way around. Binding detail at the hood, hem, and cuffs help seal out gusts when the wind picks up.
name: Columbia Sportswear Lake 22 Down Hooded Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 100% polyester, 650 Fill Power Down Insulation, RDS Certified
